New Records: Charlotte Hornets and Chicago Bulls combined to miss 150 3-point shots in two head-to-head matchups, setting an NBA record for the most missed 3-pointers in a single game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans expressed concerns about the increasing number of 3-point attempts and its impact on the game's entertainment value.
Others: The average number of 3-point attempts per game this season is 37.6, with the Boston Celtics leading at 50.7 attempts per game.
